welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pyeongtaek, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: 빵과 당신
restaurants.description: 빵과 당신 is a bakery located in 평택시.

restaurants.name: Mothi Mahal (모티마할)
restaurants.description: Mothi Mahal (모티마할) is a indian restaurant located in 평택시.

restaurants.description: 파주옥 is a korean restaurant located in 평택시.

restaurants.name: 맥도날드
restaurants.description: 맥도날드 is a fast food restaurant located in 평택시.

restaurants.name: 장안면옥

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Osan AB Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Suwon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by entering their flight information.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Cheongju Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'CJJ-Free-WiFi' on their device and entering their email address.
